features: Effective Facewash - This facial cleanser for women and men effectively removes makeup, dirt, and impurities from the skin, leaving it feeling clean and refreshed.
Formulated for Bright Skin - This face wash helps remove excess oil and control shine without over-drying. The lightweight, non-greasy formula leaves skin feeling clean and refreshed.
Thoughtful Ingredients - Gentle face cleanser is free from harsh chemicals and is enriched with nourishing ingredients to leave skin feeling soft and hydrated.

Skincare Routine Essential - Our facial cleansing products are an essential part of any skincare routine, and our facial moisturizer is no exception. Whether you're looking to remove makeup, dirt, or impurities, our face wash will leave your skin feeling clean and refreshed.
Explore Other Native Products - This is step 1 of our simple moisturizing skin care routine. Explore our catalog for more effective and safe skin care products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried out this body wash, and I am absolutely thrilled with the results. If you're looking for a product that not only cleanses but also leaves you smelling fantastic, this body wash is a game-changer.The scent of this body wash is simply incredible. It's a refreshing and invigorating fragrance that lasts for hours. I find myself catching whiffs of it throughout the day, and it never fails to boost my mood.The cleansing power is also top-notch. It lathers well and effectively removes dirt and sweat, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed. Plus, it doesn't dry out my skin like some other body washes I've used.The best part is that the scent isn't overpowering. It strikes the perfect balance between being noticeable and not overwhelming, making it suitable for both men and women.I appreciate that this body wash comes in a generously sized bottle, so it lasts a long time, providing great value for the price.In summary, I couldn't be happier with this body wash. It not only keeps me feeling clean but also leaves me smelling fantastic all day long. If you want a body wash that elevates your daily shower routine, I highly recommend giving this one a try. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing and works well too
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Native product. I'm a bit older and my skin is dryer, so I decided to try the Coconut and Vanilla blend recommend for dry skin. It not only lathers well, but leaves your skin feeling fresh and clean, but not stripped or dry and it smells amazing doing it! So yummy!! It rinses easily and works well when using in combination with a cotton pad or single use clean towel to wash your face.It's a wonderful product that turns gave washing into a spa-like experience using natural ingredients. Give it a try and enjoy the fresh clean feeling and smell too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: The wash lathers so good. I first did a full pump and it was WAY to much. So scale back to a half of pump or less and it plenty. My face is squeaky clean when finished. Its also so soft I can tell it does the job. I then follow up with the serum and cream to complete my regimen. I haven't been disappointed and this is my first of many purchases

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strongly scented face wash
reviews.reviewText: It feels nice on the skin and cleans well. I don't really like the scent and probably would not buy it again. The fragrance smells artificial and overly strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No harsh ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash, it smells good and does wonders for my skin! I tend to be on the oily side but when I wash with this I don’t get as oily compared to washing with other face washes. Any blemishes or breakouts I have dry out faster and leave no kind of scars behind 🙌🏼 It’s been a holy grail

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin & this wash doesn’t irritate it one bit. You only need a very tiny amount as it has a lot of lather (didn’t dry my face out though) which means with these large bottles, it’s going to last a long time!! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the foaming clense
reviews.reviewText: Was hesitant because it's a brightening wash and I hadn't used that before, but I love the smell and it gets my face clean and doesn't leave it dry! It's nice that it's all natural/gentle ingredients so I'm not concerned about what I'm putting on my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Consistency of wash is slimy
reviews.reviewText: The product slips easily off hand when trying to lather. It has a conditioner like texture and slips off palm easily.
